title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: SunnyMelody Womens Ugly Christmas Sweater Dress 2025 Winter Holiday Xmas Cute Turtleneck Long Sleeve Sweater Dresses

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #91,519 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #985 in Women's Casual Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Casual

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute but short for non-petite ladies
items.body: Very cute dress, nice material but was extremely short on me. I am 5’8 tall and my whole butt could me seen if i bent a little. Could maybe work better on a petite lady Read more
items.author: Epi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and quality
items.body: Exactly like the photo, I bought size S but I am more S/M. It fits great perfect for Christmas Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: I love this sweater! It looks as pictured and it is thick! This sweater will keep you warm and I have gotten lots of compliments on it. It looks as pictured and the colors are vibrant. It's soft and comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: Arika Hefner

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Huge
items.body: It's WAY too big. I got a small and you could have fit two of me in it. Read more
items.author: Meghan McDonald

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute Christmas sweater dress
items.body: Cute sweater dress def very soft but runs big. We ordered a size small and it was pretty wide/big on. Soft material for sure and the stitching was great. Would prob prefer it to have been straight vs fluffy at bottom and would have ordered xs if available. The red was bright and merry and it's def a warm sweater dress. Jsut wish it was smaller so it looked more flattering. Read more
items.author: E.P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great holiday outfit—just add boots
items.body: This ended up being the perfect dress for my office holiday party. It’s festive without looking like a typical ugly Christmas sweater, and the length was appropriate but still fun and flirty. The fabric has a nice stretch and doesn’t cling to problem areas. I wore it with black knee-high boots and gold earrings, and the whole outfit came together effortlessly. Super pleased with this purchase. Read more
items.author: lashannon Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A festive dress that still feels classy
items.body: This dress somehow manages to be festive without losing that feminine, classy look. I loved the ruffle hem—it creates a pretty A-line effect. The turtleneck kept me warm during a snowy outdoor stroll, and the sleeves were long enough for my 5’7 frame. Overall, a stylish but still comfortable Christmas outfit. Read more
items.author: Phyllis Y. Masumoto

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, A-red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
